definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Can you get me a few stamps?
sentences.chinese: 你能替我買幾張郵花嗎？

sentences.english: You just stick a stamp on the postcard and put it in the mailbox over there.
sentences.chinese: 貼張郵花再扔到前邊那個郵筒裏就可以了。

sentences.english: people enjoyed the stamps very much.
sentences.chinese: 人們非常喜愛這些個郵花。

sentences.english: You can often pick up lots of used stamps very cheaply.
sentences.chinese: 你時常可以很便宜地買到大量用過的郵花。
